price: Iwe wanawapitia watumishi wao kama kwamba ni lulu zilizomo katika chaza.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
footnotes: Na watakuwa wakiwapitia vijana walio wekwa kwa kuwatumikia, kwa weupe wao na usafi wao kama lulu iliomo ndani ya chaza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
